description:
We have another brilliant in-person event lined up for the end of September with 4 fantastic speakers who will all be delivering a Lightning talk on their chosen topics.

The speakers are currently finalising their talks and topics so further details will be released in due course.

As for the venue, it will be in Clockwise Bristol which is a 2-minute walk from Runway East, for those who have been before.

Mark your calendars as this is sure to be a great event!

If you haven't already, sign up to the slack channel to keep up to date with everything and chat with people in the local community.

https://join.slack.com/t/bristol-cn-and-devops/shared_invite/zt-1dvjtd9l3-Rkyc\~Ax6b9_A9TPNyCrKUw
title: Evening Lightning Talk Event
